description: A project entity contains information about the overall project.
title: Project
name: project

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information provided by the system.

contributors.description: People contributing to any aspect of the project.

supplementary_links.description: External link(s) pointing to code, supplementary data files, or analysis files associated with the project which will not be uploaded.

insdc_project_accessions.description: An International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (INSDC) project accession.
insdc_project_accessions.guidelines: Enter accession if project has been archived. Accession can be from the DDBJ, NCBI, or EMBL-EBI and must start with DRP, SRP, or ERP, respectively.

geo_series_accessions.description: A Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) series accession.
geo_series_accessions.guidelines: Enter accession if project has been archived. Accession must start with GSE.

array_express_accessions.guidelines: Enter accession if project has been archived. Accession must start with E-.

insdc_study_accessions.description: An International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (INSDC) study accession.
insdc_study_accessions.guidelines: Enter accession if study has been archived. Accession can be from the DDBJ, NCBI, or EMBL-EBI and must start with PRJD, PRJN, or PRJE, respectively.

biostudies_accessions.guidelines: Enter accession if study has been archived.
